column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Let me be very clear
column2: our server was fantastic. Three of four pizzas came out and she was so apologetic. However this wasn't The Chicago pizza that I was expecting nor the Chicago style pizza that I had heard it was. And to be clear
column3: the pizza wasn't bad. It was just not as good as other Chicago style pizza is that I've had while visiting the Windy City.
